src:
Aubameyang, Kapten Baru Arsenal yang Hendak Direbut Real Madrid
06 Nov 2019, 14:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid belum memiliki komposisi yang tepat di lini depan. Luka Jovic sejauh ini belum tampil sesuai harapan. Madrid disebut tertarik pada servis penyerang Arsenal, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
Aubameyang tampil sangat bagus di Arsenal, begitu juga ketika masih membela Borussia Dortmund. Pemain asal Gabon tersebut konsisten mencetak gol setiap musimnya. Dia jadi salah satu penyerang terbaik di Premier League.
Walau performa Arsenal masih belum stabil, Aubameyang terus mencetak gol. Dari 78 penampilan yang sudah dimainkan, Aubameyang mampu mencetak 50 gol dan 11 assist. Jumlah gol tersebut masih akan terus bertambah.
Catatan apik Aubameyang memikat Real Madrid. Real Madrid butuh pemain yang bisa menjamin terciptanya sebuah gol. Sesuatu yang hilang dari Real Madrid ketika Cristiano Ronaldo pindah ke Juventus.
text:
Aubameyang, Arsenal's New Captain who Wants Real Madrid to Seize
Nov 6 2019, 14:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid do not have the right composition on the front lines. Luka Jovic has so far not appeared as expected. Madrid is said to be interested in serving Arsenal striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
Aubameyang performed very well at Arsenal, as well as when he was still defending Borussia Dortmund. The Gabonese player consistently scores goals every season. He became one of the best attackers in the Premier League.
Although Arsenal's performance is still not stable, Aubameyang continues to score goals. Of the 78 appearances that have been played, Aubameyang is able to score 50 goals and 11 assists. The number of goals will still continue to grow.
Aubameyang's neat notes captivated Real Madrid. Real Madrid need players who can guarantee a goal. Something that was missing from Real Madrid when Cristiano Ronaldo moved to Juventus.
